short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds comments to John Gruber’s daringfireball.net to encourage stimulating discussion. It is not endorsed by daringfireball.net.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds comments to John Gruber’s daringfireball.net, in order to encourage stimulating in-depth and well-informed discussions on tech news.

It is not supported nor endorsed by daringfireball.net or John Gruber.

Changes in DFWC 4:
- HTTPS support
